alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 14 at 8:53AM EST until January 14 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY, ROBUST WINDS, AND HIGH ERC VALUES FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 072, 074, 172, AND 173... The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a Red Flag Warning for low humidity, robust winds, and high ERC values, which is in effect until 8 PM EST this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 072 Metro Broward, Fire Weather Zone 074 Metro Miami-Dade, Fire Weather Zone 172 Coastal Broward and Fire Weather Zone 173 Coastal Miami-Dade. * TIMING...This afternoon and evening. * WIND...20 foot winds around 10-15 mph with gusts around 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...Low to mid 30s. * ERC...Upper 20s to low 30s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
